import {useState} from "react"; function TodoForm(){ const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [product, setProduct] = useState(''); const [lists, setList] = useState([]); const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); // 👈️ prevent page refresh setList((lists) => [...lists, { name: name, product: product }]); document.getElementById("todoForm").reset(); }; return(

Todo List Form

setName(event.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Adınız ve Soyadınız" />
setProduct(event.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Ne Lazım?" />
) } export default TodoForm;
